data.text:
How Africa’s No. 1 airline avoided layoffs and losses during the pandemic. An interview of Ethiopian Airlines Group CEO Mr. Tewolde GebreMariam with @thepointsguy

Click the link to read the story
https://t.co/Odo9k6L37i https://t.co/PkXxvVJNKP

Ethiopian Airlines has succeeded where many other airlines have struggled, largely due to a strong plan set out in 2010. The Impressive Rise of Ethiopian Airlines article by simple flying. Click on the link to read the story : https://t.co/ANx0kbRn12 https://t.co/FkmgWjQy30

Travel with us and make your travel memorable. 
Thank you Hilena Tafesse for sharing the picture.  #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/LwcxjwQCDK

data.text: Sit back, relax and feel refreshed on board Ethiopian. #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/lyndY5ifu5

In line with our Diversified Aviation Business Model of Vision 2025, we have been increasing our cargo capacity in fleet size, infrastructure, cargo connectivity network and skilled manpower.
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/7rXQNZoG6o

Ethiopian Airlines establishes a global standard cargo Conversion program to convert the B-767-300 ER to dedicated freighter services in partnership agreement with Israel Aerospace Industries (IAI). https://t.co/Eq2PmJY2rX

data.text:
We thank Muhammed Okur for today's ETmoments, for an amazing night view taken on-board Ethiopian Airlines. Share your photos or videos with us, tag us and use #ETMoments, we will be happy to share them back with you. 
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/YF8ztGTE8U

We are glad for participating in the transportation and delivery of 499,200 doses of AstraZeneca vaccine donated by the UK Government to Ethiopia through COVAX.
 #Ethiopian #EthiopianCargo #Cargowithcare #Pharmawing https://t.co/3QBxStKAG7
